text: Fistful of Dirt is a 2018 American drama film, directed by Sebastián Silva, from a screenplay by Silva and Pedro Peirano. It stars Julio Gastón Ramos, Dolores Pedro and Modesto Lacen. It had its world premiere at the Telluride Film Festival on August 31, 2018. ==Cast== * Julio Gastón Ramos as Yei * Dolores Pedro as Wanda * Modesto Lacen as Yei ==Release== It had its world premiere at the Telluride Film Festival on August 31, 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2018 films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:American independent films Category:Films shot in Puerto Rico
title: Fistful of Dirt
